description.zh: 本課程主要目的在介紹嵌入式系統設計之基本原理與方法,以使學生瞭解如何使用軟/硬體元件來設計嵌入式系統。課程內容包含:1.嵌入式系統之基本介紹2.客戶單一目的處理器(硬體)3.通用型處理器(軟體)4.標準單一目的處理器(周邊)5.記憶體6.介面7.設計實例-數位相機及PDA 8.IC設計技術9.設計方法10.ARM嵌入式微處理器之介紹11.ARM嵌入式微處理器之應用12軟硬體共同設計簡介13.SOC嵌入式系統簡介
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduction a methodology and theory of embedded system design.Then student can using hardware/software components to design an embedded system. The content of this course are shown as follows:1.An Introduction to Embedded System. 2.Custom Single-Purpose Processor:Hardtware. 3.General Puprose Processor:Software  4.Standard  Single-Purpose Process:Peripherals 5.Memory 6.Interfacing 7.Example-Digital Camera and PDA 8.IC Technology 9.Design Technology  10.ARM Embedded Microprocessor 11.ARM Embedded Microprocessor Applications 12. Introduction to Hardware/Software Co-Design 13. Introduction to Embedded System of System-on Chip

description.zh: 本課程以講授計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到幾種目前廣泛使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器用的路由協定為主。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer.  Popular physical layer medias are discussed first.  Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion.  Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

name.en: Machine Vision and Image Processing Algorithm

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹機器視覺之基本觀念與系統設計、組成機器視覺系統之元件 (攝影機、鏡頭及照明設備等)、重要之照像幾何學與立體測量法，同時介紹二位元影像處理、視覺對準法則、相機校正法、計算視覺與打光技術等重要基礎知識，配合影像處理演算法之介紹，使學員建立完整之機器視覺基礎與概念。(本課程參考麻省理工學院(MIT)之開放式課程)將包含下列主題:o 影像之形成 (Image Formation)o 視覺系統設計 (Vision System Design)o 移動中視覺 (Motion Vision)o 陰影成像法 (Shape from Shading)o 二位元影像處理 (Binary Image Processing)o 照像測量法 (Photogrammetry)o 立體影像 (Stereo Vision)o 對準法則 (Object Representation Alignment)o 相機校正法 (Camera Calibration)o 計算視覺 (Computational Vision)o 打光技術 (Optical Illumination)o 機器視覺之應用 (Applications to robotics and intelligent machine
description.en: This subject provides an introduction to the process of generating asymbolic description of an environment from an image and the fundamentals ofmachine vision and image processing techniques. Lectures include the followingtopics:※ The physics of image formation,※ Vision System Design,※ Motion vision,※ Recovering shapes from shading,※ Shape from Shading,※ Binary image processing,※ Photogrammetry,※ Stereo Vision,※ Object representation alignment,※ Camera Calibration,※ Computational vision,※ Optical Illumination,※ Applications to robotics and intelligent machine interactionTextbook:Horn, Berthold K. P., Robot Vision. Cambridge, MA: MIT Press/McGraw-Hill,March 1986. ISBN: 0262081598.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有關人工智慧理論與應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的歷史、代理人技術、搜尋法則、智識表達、機器學習及感知與辨識等用電腦解決問題的方法。
description.en: This course provides a broad technical introduction of theory and practice of Artificial Intelligence(AI). The topics include:history of AI, agents, search, knowledge representation, machine learning, and oerception and cognition.

description.zh: 本課程旨於深入探討如何利用數學方法來分析並了解工程上之問題之數學模式，藉以「線性轉換」、「向量分析」、「微分算子」與「複變分析」等四大內容，以及其應用方法。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on "linear transformation", "vector analysis", "differential operator" and "complexanalysis" to analysis and modeling the engineering problems.

description.zh: 1.幾何光學2.波動光學3.光束光學4.傅氏光學5.光電磁學6.偏極光學與晶體光學
description.en: 1. Ray Optics2. Wave Optics3. Beam Optics4. Fourier Optics5. Electromagnetic Optics6. Polarization and Crystal Optics

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程包括：光的傳播、光的向量特性、光的同調性與干涉、多光束的干涉、光的繞射、晶體光學、熱輻射與光子、光譜、光跡光學。
description.en: This course includes the propagation of light, the vectorial nature of light, coherence and interference, multiple-beam interference, diffraction, optics of solids, thermal radiation and light quanta, optical spectra, and ray optics.

description.zh: 修先課程：光學。 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1.簡介 2.二維線性系統分析3.繞射理論 4.近場及遠場繞射5.透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6.影像系統之頻域分析7.空間濾波與光資訊處理 8.全像
description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。  由電磁學之理論推導光波在光導波管之運行、偶合及調變，並經由近代物理之量子論介紹雷射理論及光偵測器原理。經由雷射之電光調變、光導波管之電場調制與光偵測器之光電轉換，將積體光學之基本概念完整介紹，並針對其特性及應用，加以說明。
description.en: From the electromagnetic theory, the optical waves propagation, coupling, and modulating in optical wave-guides are proposed. Also from the quantum theory introduced by modern physics, the laser theory and the principles of photo detectors are introduced. By the concepts of electro-optical modulation of laser devices, electrical modulation of optical wave-guides, and the opto-electronic conversion of photo detector devices, the fundamental concepts of integrated optics are introduced. Also the characteristics and applications of integrated optics are presented.

description.zh: 1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖種類及特性 3.訊號的退化 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.數位傳輸系統 8.光固子及DWDM系統
description.en: 1.Introduction to optical fiber communications.2.Optical fibers-losses and fabrications3.Signal degradation4.Light emitters5.Optical receivers6.Repeaters and optical amplifier7.Digital communications8.Solitions and dense wavelength-division multiplexing   tgdi systems

name.en: Design and application of optical coating

description.zh: (1)基本理論(2)光學薄膜設計之圖示法(3)分光鏡(4)高反射鏡(5)	截止濾光片(6)帶通濾光片(7)斜向入射薄膜
description.en: (1)Basic theory (2)Admittance diagrams for optical coating design(3)Beam splitter(4)High reflection coating(5)Edge filter(6)Band-pass filter(7)Tilted coatings

name.zh: 液晶顯示器驅動電子學

description.zh: 1.液晶材料的種類 2.液晶物理特性 3. 液晶顯示模式4. 薄膜電晶體元件物理4. 薄膜電晶體操作特性 5. 像素的結構及佈局 7. 顯示器的等效電路模型8. 顯示器驅動原理 9. 響應時間的驅動補償
description.en: 1. Types of liquid crystals  2. Physics of liquid crystals  3. Display modes and electro-optical properties  4. Properties of a-Si Thin film transistors  5. Operation of TFTs  6. Layouts of pixels with TFT switches  7. Circuit model of LCDs  8. Addressing of LCDs  9. Driving compensation for response time

description.zh: 1. 太陽能電池與太陽能光譜，2. 太陽能電池材料特性，3. 產生、結合與太陽能電池元件物理，4. 轉換效率、損失與量測，5. 矽太陽能電池技術，6. 化合物與多接面太陽能電池技術，7. 先進太陽能電池技術，8. 太陽能系統與應用。
description.en: 1 Introduction of Solar Cells and Sunlight, 2. Review of Solar Cell Material Properties, 3. Generation, Recombination, and Device Physics, 4. Conversion Efficiency Limits, Losses, and Measurement, 5. Silicon Solar Cell Technology, 6. Compound Material and Multi-Junction Solar Cell Technology, 7. Advance Solar Cells, 8. Solar Cell Systems and Applications.

description.zh: 每週六小時二學分的專業必修課，旨在訓練碩一新生能在短時間內學習各種生物科技必須且基本的實驗技術並能有通盤的了解。課程的安排除了在生物科技所的教授實驗室中學習外，也將安排學生至中央研究院、國立臺灣大學、長庚大學及醫院、國防醫學大學及業界生物科技公司學習先進的生物科技的實驗方法和技術。
description.en: This course will provide students to learn essential and basic methods and experiments in biotechnology. The students must learn the methods and experiments in laboratories of the professors in Institute of Biotechnology, Academia Sinica, National Taiwan University, Chang Gung University, National Defense University and biotech companies.

description.zh: 本課程主要提供學生在生物化學上幾個選擇性主題較深的知識。包括:蛋白質結構和功能、蛋白質輸送、蛋白質分解、接受器、生物膜、生物代謝和基因調控、人類疾病的生物化學及分子生物和生物技術。
description.en: This course provides students with a depth of knowledge of a number of selected topics in biochemistry. It Including of protein structure and function; protein transport; protein degradation; receptors; biological membranes; bioenergetics including photosynthesis; metabolic and genetic regulation;; biochemistry of human diseases and the techniques that underpin the developments of molecular biology and biotechnology.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 生物科技產品品質安全與管理法規
name.en: The Introduction to Quality,Safety and Regulation of Biology

description.zh: 生物科技產業已是二十一世紀世界各國的重要產業，我國亦視生技產業為繼電子產業後的新興產業，然而生物科技產業與其他科技產業的差異，在於用於人體或具醫療用途的生技產品，除了品質管理外，更須考慮安全與效能，我國與世界各國對於生技產品大都以建置相當程度的法規環境，以有效的管理生技產品並確保人之安全。因此，對於生技產品特有的管理制度以及安全與效能等特殊需求若無正確的認識，將非常不利產業發展。本課程將以疫苗、血液製劑、基因工程製劑、診斷試劑、人體細胞組織產品等目前已研發成熟與正發展中的生技產品為例，從產品設計、品質與製程管制、效能與安全評估、法規環境與管理制度到我國管理方式，以深入淺出的方式做完整的介紹，此外，課程中也將針對生技產業面臨的生物安全問題及其需要的設施、生技產業的挑戰與機會等議題，進行充分的講述與討論。透過此課程，期望學生建立在生技產品品質管理、製程管制、安全評估及產品登記等方面的基本概念，以培養生技產業目前極度缺乏的製程規劃人材。
description.en: In the 21th century, the bio-technological industry has been the important industry in the world.  It is also the most emergent sunrise industry following the electronics industry in Taiwan.  The bio-technological industry is very different from the other technological industries.  The biological products intended for human therapeutic use have to face the needs of safety and efficacy except product quality.  Taiwan government and other countries have established the regulatory framework for biological products to ensure their safety and efficacy.  Therefore, the realization of the management system for biological products is very useful to industry development.This course uses the examples of vaccines, blood products,  recombinant DNA products, diagnostic devices and human cell and tissue-based products to introduce the design control, quality control, process control, evaluation for safety and efficacy and regulatory framework in Taiwan.  The course also discusses the issues of fac

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

name.en: Special Topics on Characteristics of Polymers

description.zh: 介紹高分子分子結構、型態學、流變學、化學性質、熱性質、機械、電學及光學等特性之分析方法及實例。
description.en: This course will cover the examples of analysis of the mechanical, thermal, electrical, optical and chemical properties, and the structure, morphology, and rheology of polymers.

description.zh: 生物電化學可以獲得更多先進的訊息，其中包括生化反應、形態學，以及物理、化學和電學等相關性質。運用相關的技術方法，例如電化學工具，可用以研究異相與均相反應，亦可獲得諸多界面間的化學活性和圖譜以利用於微裝置的發展。對生物分析而言，生物電化學感測器具有最大的再現性，並能夠成功的引用於電活性生化物種、母體材料，以及其規格上。生物電分析方法包括最先進和有用的方法，其中大部分皆建立在此領域的的基礎上。
description.en: Bioelectrochemistry can be investigated to get more and more advanced information about biochemical reaction, morphology, and physical, chemical, and electric properties. The techniques have been used in a variety of ways, for example, as an electrochemical tool to study heterogeneous and homogeneous reactions, for high-resolution imaging of the chemical reactivity and topography of various interfaces, and for microfabrication. For bioanalysis, bioelectrochemistry sensors have maximum reliability and can be successfully employed in electroactive biomaterials, matrix materials, and their size. Bioelectroanalysis include descriptions of the most advanced and successful methods, which in large part build on the fundamentals will be described.

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹薄膜製作有關的基礎理論與技術。講述內容包括真空技術，薄膜基礎，薄膜製作技術，蝕刻技術，薄膜評估方法以及薄膜技術的應用等。讓學生認識薄膜在高科技產業上的應用與其重要性，製作薄膜的方法與技術以及其未來的發展。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Thin films technology and Thin film materials science. 2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes 4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction 5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films 6. Chemical vapor deposition 7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation 8. Film structure 9. Characterization of thin films and surface 10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films 11. Mechanical properties of thin films.

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介 2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3.電子繞射理論 4.電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理6. EDS及WDS之X光光譜分析
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2. Electron Beam and Their Interaction with Specimen3. Electron Diffraction4. The Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM)5. The Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) 6. Chemical Analysis in the Electron Microscope

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 1.陶瓷絕緣體之性質2.陶瓷電容材料3.壓電及光電陶瓷4.磁性陶瓷5.陶瓷感應器：理論及實務6. ZnO變阻器之應用及特性7. 多層陶瓷技術8. 高電導陶瓷
description.en: This course is a special topics of Dielectrical Materials.

description.zh: 熱分析課程是闡述熱學基礎原理(熱力學,不可逆熱力學及動力學)以及其操作技巧;這包括:熱學.差示熱分析,熱量學,熱力學分析,熱膨脹以及熱失重分析。本課程適合大四及研一生。
description.en: The course of thermal analysis is described starting with its theories (thermodynamics, irreversible thermodynamics, and kinetics) and covering the basic techniques: thermometry, differential thermal analysis, calorimetry,thermo mechanical analysis and dilatometry, and thermogravimetry.This course is suitable for the senior undergraduate and beginning graduate students.

description.zh: 1.合金製程簡介2.成份改變製程　a.合金熔煉-感應電爐、真空感應電爐  b.合金精煉-電弧爐、  c.電渣重熔精煉、真空電弧精煉、電子束精煉、電漿精煉3.合金結構改變製程　a.凝固控製與快速凝固　　b.方向性凝固　　　　　c.熱處理控制-均質化、強化處理　　d.鍛造、晶粒控制　　　　　　　4.合金形狀改重製程鍛造、軋壓、擠形、粉末冶金5.未來合金製程之發展及電腦之應用
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Processes of Structural Alloys.

description.zh: 超硬材料是一種越來越普及的新興材料。超硬材料可以作成精密加工工具及多種高價值產品。是提升一國競爭力不可或缺的尖端材料。超硬材料包括鑽石及立方氮化硼。本課程將介紹世界各國最先進製造超硬材料方法，包括超高壓技術及鑽石膜技術。而目前日新月異之超硬材料之發展及應用，亦作進一步介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Hard materials.

description.zh: 本課程在討論生醫工程之性質與應用在整形外科,骨科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫工程之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the engineering of bio-materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程主 要是對生醫玻璃處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括生醫玻璃技術的基本理論，處理技術，各種生醫玻璃的製造方法與相關知識，以及各種生醫玻璃技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Bio-glass in the system of Na2O- CaO-Sio2-P2O5 and related glasses are introduces initially in this course. The Bioactive glasses and Glass-ceramic in clinical uses are taught next. The following chapter is covered from bio-glasses and glass-ceramics bond to living bone through layer which is formed on their surfaces in the living body. Blass-ceramics for hyperthermia treatment of cancer and Glasses for radiotherapy of cancer is brief introduced in this course finally.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

name.zh: 平面顯示器原理與技術
name.en: Principle of Flat Panel Display Technology

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.視覺與色彩 3.陰極射線管顯示器 4.電漿顯示器 5.液晶顯示器 6.電致發光顯示器 7.場發射顯示器 8.有機發光顯示器
description.en: Introduction of the theories and technologies of flat panel display and the future development of flat display technology.  1.Introduction 2.Sight and color 3.Cathode-ray tube(CRT) 4.Plasma panel display(PDP) 5.Liquid crystal display(LCD) 6.Electrolumisence display(ELP) 7.Field emission display(FED) 8.Organic light emitting device(OLED)

description.zh: 本課程內容含有: (1)簡介。(2)貯氫合金種類(3)貯氫合金結構與性質(4)貯氫合金製程---機械冶金(5)貯氫合金製程---真空感應熔煉(6)貯氫材料之吸放氫測量方法(7)貯氫合金應用(8)鎳氫電池材料(9)奈米碳材之結構與性質(10)奈米碳材之製程(11)奈米碳材之應用(12)氫燃料電池---質子交換膜材料(13)氫燃料電池---膜電極組材料
description.en: The class includes :1.Course Introduction, 2.Classes of Hydrogen Storage Alloys (HSAs),3. Structure and Properties of HSAs,4. Production of HSAs ---Mechanical Alloying Process,5.,roduction of HSAs ---Vacuum Induction Melting (VIM) Process,6.. Method of Measuring Storage Capacity for Hydrogen Storage Materials,7. Application of HSAs,8. Materials of Nickel Hydride Battery Electrode,9. Structure and Properties of Carbon Nano Tubes (CNTs), 10. Production of CNTs, 11. Application of CNTs,12. Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Proton Exchange Membrane, 13 Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Membrane Electrode Assembly (MEA)

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理3.電子擾繞射理論4.電子繞射圖行及缺陷分析方法5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2.The electron Microscope3.Scanning Electron Microscopy(SEM)　(1)Electron beam-specimen interaction　(2)Image formation in the SEM4.Transmission Electron Microscopy(TEM)　(1)Diffraction Theory  (2)Contrast Theory5.Specimen Preparation

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 一、地質資料之收集分析與應用二、大地應力分析量測方法。三、地下坑室設計。四、地下坑室施工。五、監測與管理。
description.en: 一、Collection analysis and application of geological data二、Geotechnical stress analysis and measurement。三、Underground excavation design。四、Underground excavation operation。五、Monitoring and management。

description.zh: 一、系統、相、成份、自由度、Gibbs相律及其應用二、一成份系統相圖熱力學。三、二成份系統相圖熱力學。四、三成份系統相圖熱力學。五、相變化動力學簡介。六、相圖測定簡介。
description.en: 1.System、 phase 、component 、freedom 、Gibbs Law and its application2.One component system3.Two component system4.Three component system。5.The kinetics of phase equilibrium (transformation)6.Phase diagram determination

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。本課程偏重與大地工程相關之調查、規劃、設計、研究、分析、試驗等相關的案例討論。高等大地工程(一)主要課程單元包括:[1]基礎工程案例、[2]邊坡特性分類、[3]邊坡特性調查、[4]邊坡安定分析、[5]邊坡工程整治、[6]邊坡工程案例等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [I] consist of (1) Case studies of foundation problems, (2) Landslide Types, (3) Investigation of landslide features, (4) Stability analysis of slope, (5) Mitigation of unstable slope, (6) Engineering case studies.

description.zh: 探、取樣及地球物理方法，十字片剪力儀、孔內側壓力儀、平鈹膨脹                                          儀、階段平鈑膨脹儀、孔內直接剪力儀、平鈑載重試驗、基椿載重試驗                                          、地錯抗拔試驗、現場透水試驗探討，岩石直剪、平鈑、岩石裂縫、孔                                          內應力、岩栓抗拔、隧道浮空等量測探討，鋼筋計、水壓計、土壓計、                                          沈陷計等監測儀器之運用說明。
description.en: advanced engineering geology , sampling and physical method, application of                                          instrument and test like pressurement , vane shear instrument , dilationter . in-situ                                          permeability test, direct shear instrument, foundation loads test, rock direct shear                                          test, rock cleft, pressure meter, steel bar instrument , piezometer, soil pressurement

description.zh: 本課程介紹工程與科學相關之主要地球物理方法及應用，包含震測，重力，熱流，及磁力。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來解決工程問題。
description.en: The course aims to advance students' knowledge of the physics underlying different applied geophysical methods and how the methods are used for exploration, geotechnics, and characterization.  We will cover the theories and modeling techniques of seismic refraction, seismic reflection, heat flow, gravity, and magnetics methods.

description.zh: 資源工程的製程技術範圍包括了一些無機性及有機性物質的物理與化學變化。要有效的應用這些物質的製程技術，必須要對製程的化學反應動力學有基本的認識。本課程的主要目的在於教導學生如何設計一個程序以進行所要的化學反應。進行此類程序設計必須要將物理程序與化學程序的速率式相結合。而相關的基本原理包括：物理程序的能量傳送及質量傳送原理，及化學程序的反應動力學。為了達到這個目的，學生要對化學反應的本徵反應速率及程序的輸送現象有基本的認識。此外，本課程亦將介紹反應器設計的基本原理。據此，本課程的教學內容包括：1.	化學反應動力學2.	理想反應器的基本質量守恆3.	等溫與非等溫反應器原理4.	非均質反應程序、觸媒與吸附理論
description.en: Material and resources processing technologies focus on the physical and chemical process of inorganic and organic materials. For effective applications of these processing technologies, understanding the principles of chemical kinetics is essential. The major objective of this course is to learn how to design a process for carrying out desirable chemical reaction. To design this process requires rates of both physical and chemical processes. The principles governing such physical processes as energy transfer and mass transfer are often as important as those which govern chemical kinetics. To combine the rates of chemical and physical process, the essential feature is to understand the intrinsic rate of chemical reaction and the transport phenomena of the process. In addition, the basic principles of reactor design will also be introduced based on abovementioned fundamental principles. Therefore, the contents of this course include:1.	chemical kinetics2.	fundamentals of mass conser

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up. The teaching methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

name.zh: 互動媒體設計專題講座

description.zh: 為掌握產業界的技術新知、學術界的專業研究、藝文界的脈動等，本課程講座將廣邀互動媒體設計的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術等面向，分別以宏觀的政治、社會、文化、科技、環境等角度剖析，另以微觀角度深入個案研究作探討，藉此議題討論互動媒體設計的現況與未來發展趨勢。教學評量將以各項的主題式討論報告為主。
description.en: To understand science and technological information from business, professional research from academic and issues from art and cultural fields, the seminars on interactive media design should be invited these fields of expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion. With the macro-perspective of politics, social, culture, technology and environment, the seminar focuses on the dimension of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art. Besides, the seminars explore case studies with micro-perspective to discuss interactive media design existing and future development. The assessment includes thematic discussion and final report.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人本設計 (User-Centered Design, UCD) 之理論與應用。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念-以使用者為中心之設計，課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過案例之研討了解其應用。課程內容包含使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用性設計與評估、以使用者為中心之創新產品設計與開發、設計心理學以及通用設計等。教學將以課堂講授、專家座談、個案研討等方式進行，並以報告繳交以及分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories, application and research of User-Centered Design (UCD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UCD, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, usability design and evaluation, user-centered product design and development, design psychology and universal design. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 良好的介面設計，能讓使用者快速有效的完成相關操作行為，加強使用過程的正面經驗。本互動程式設計之課程內容旨在專注於以適切的程式撰寫能力，完成介面與使用者有效溝通的相關課題。課程內容包含遠端網路操作介面之程式設計、手持式電子產品之程式設計、大型互動裝置之程式設計等。程式學習如Action Script / JAVA / JSP / ASP / MY SQL / C / C++。
description.en: Good interface design would help users operate efficiently and create a positive experience in the whole operation process. This course focuses on the appropriate programming design ability that establishes an efficient communication between interface and users. Course content includes programming design of remote internet operation interface, handheld electric products, large interactive device, and so forth. Programming acquisition include Action Script / JAVA / JSP / ASP / MY SQL / C / C++.

description.zh: 本課程在探討多媒體技術應用於各互動媒體設計與實作，首先介紹多媒體技術之基本理論及一些處理技巧，其中多媒體影像包含影像編輯、製作、轉換與格式介紹等。為因應研究生的不同專業領域，本課程將強調基本知識的培養與技術的訓練， 例如：有關Photoshop, Illustrator, 3D Max, Sketch up, Flash, After Effects.等技能的養成。
description.en: This course is focused on the application and design practice of interactive digital multimedia technologies. The contents include basic knowledge and techniques on image editing, making, transforming and format introduction. To meets different students' background, this course emphasizes on the understanding of basic training on software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, 3D Max, Sketch up, Flash, and After Effects.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Mechatronics in Modern Industries.

name.en: Special Topics on Mechanical & Electric engineering   (一)

description.zh: 包括理論與實驗，由機電所教授共同開課，課程討主要內容介紹機電科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，側重在機電科技與創新設計相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course, conducted by several professors from the Institute of. Mechanical & Electric Engineering introduces the fundamental theories and advanced technologies in the field of mechatronics and advanced technology. The topics covered mainly lie in areas of automation technology, mechatronics, advanced manufacturing technology, air conditioning & refrigeration engineering and vehicle engineering.

description.zh: 由於經濟活動的急遽擴張，大量生產、大量消費的生活型態，產生大量廢棄物，導致環境負擔超過涵容及復原能力，加上台灣地狹人稠，自然資源不豐，造成環境品質惡化及發展遲滯危機，因此，如何突破天然資源限制，開創永續發展動能，以建設舒適美好生活環境，實為當前重要課題。本課程分別從污染防治、生化程序控制、材料製程應用及災害防治等工程技術觀點著手，培養具永續發展之經營管理智能。
description.en: Because of fast economic development of the modern society, our environment has been deteriorated due to the massive waste production from these economic activities.  Therefore, how to recover and provide the best environment from engineering point of view is a very critical issue.  This course will provide specific knowledge base to these advanced students from pollution control, chemical process, disaster prevention and material engineering points of view in order to minimize waste production before, during and after the production process.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧，介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧及分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。

description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information systems, information technologies, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在學習供應鏈的運籌管理、策略設計、規劃與營運的相關議題，以及瞭解供應鏈中各成員間對於物流、資訊流與金流的活動與管理。課程內容包含：供應鏈的競爭策略擬定、配送網路設計、需求預測、總體規劃、存貨管理、運輸管理、委外決策與規劃、資訊科技應用、與供應鏈協同整合。
description.en: The focus of this course is on the strategic design, planning and operation of a supply chain, as well as the efficient management of the flows of product, information, funds in a supply chain. The content includes the strategic fit between competitive strategies and supply chain strategies of firms, the design of supply chain networks, demand forecasting, aggregate planning, inventory management, transportation management, sourcing decision and planning, information technology, and coordination and integration of supply chain members.

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concept and approaches for system analysis. Besides, the methods and procedures for developing a computerized information system is also discussed. It includes system analysis, system design, system development, system implementation and system evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在學習各種運輸系統分析的模式與方法，主要分別從供給面與需求面探討運輸系統，並且探討供給與需求之間的網路均衡分析。課程內容包含：運輸網路設計、分析與最佳化、等候理論、網路均衡交通量指派、動態網路分析、最佳化車輛路線求解以及運輸網路模擬等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on the models and algorithms for transportation system analysis. In addition to discussing the supply and demand sides of transportation systems, this course aims to analyze and solve for the network equilibrium between supply and demand. The main topics include, but not limited to, transportation network design, analysis, and optimization, queueing theory, network equilibrium traffic assignment, dynamic network analysis, vehicle routing and scheduling, and network simulation.

description.zh: 網際網路的變化快速且所使用的技術也日新月益。現今網際網路已成為人們生活中的重要部份。本課程的主要目標在廣泛的介紹網際網路上架構與應用的各種設計觀念。本課程的組成包括以下八類的原理介紹：一、網際網路架構；二、連上網際網路的各種方法；三、網際網路通訊的各種項目；四、WWW；五、網際網路上的各種應用工具；六、網際網路上多媒體應用；七、企業內部網路；八、網際網路上的資訊安全。
description.en: The Internet changes so quickly and the technology advances rapidly. Now, the Internet has become an essential part of our life. The goal of the course is breadth to cover the principles of the Internet. The content of this course is composed of the following eight parts. In Part 1, the underlying basics of the Internet is explained. Part 2 depicts the various ways you can connect your computer to the Internet. Part 3 covers every aspect of Internet communications. Part 4 covers what has become by far the most popular part of the Internet--WWW. Part 5 takes a close look at common Internet tools. Part 6 shows you how some of the various multimedia technologies of the Internet work. Part 7 covers intranets, how the Internet works with the outside world, and how you can shop online. Finally, Part 8 covers security concerns.

description.zh: 中文概述Chinese Description 	1. 多媒體資料形式與儲存方式之研究 2. 網路多媒體資料傳輸方式之研究 3. 分散式多媒體資料管理技術之研究 4. 多媒體管理資訊系統之研究 5. 超媒體資料管理之研究 6. 網際網路多媒體資訊管理之研究 7. 企業內網路多媒體資訊管理之研究 8. 多媒體技術在商業自動化之應用 9. 多媒體技術在生產系統之應用
description.en: The Multimedia Information Management Course is to study the techniques for managing multimedia information and its applications on the commerce automation and production systems. The course includes the following topics: 1. Multimedia information format and storage policy 2. Network flow management for multimedia information 3. Distributed multimedia information management techniques 4. Multimedia management information systems 5. Hypermedia information management techniques 6. World wide web multimedia information management techniques 7. Intranet multimedia information management techniques 8. Applications of multimedia techniques on commerce automation 9. Applications of multimedia techniques on production systems

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。 本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings. The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.﹒

description.en: Mechanisms and machine elements, classical dynamics, modern machining methods, electric machines and drivers, sensors, special topics and labs of machatrocics system.

description.zh: 本課程將給予學習者充分瞭解現代体電路設計技術如何產生矽晶片與應用在各種複雜電子系統上.課程內容如下所述:1.系統設計流程2.MOS電晶体理論3.IC制程技術4.電路效能評估5.CMOS電路與邏輯設計6.副系統設計7.期末專題計劃

description.zh: 課程之目的在於讓學生能夠學習到RFID之電磁相容規範與驗測技術，以培養學生具備RFID EMC實務與驗測之能力。本課程之大綱如下所示：1.電磁相容與RFID簡介2.電磁相容規範3.訊號、雜訊與頻譜4.輻射性電磁干擾5.傳導性放射干擾6.串音干擾7.屏蔽效應8.RFID EMC驗測方法
description.en: The goal of this course for students is to learn the theorem and specification of Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC) with the verification techniques of RFID. The outlines of the course are: 1.Introduction of EMC and RFID2.Specification of EMC3.Signal, noise and spectrum4.Interference of EM emission5.Interference of conducted emission6.Interference of cross-talk7.Shielding effectiveness8.Verification techniques on EMC of RFID

name.zh: 混合訊號積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在研習混合訊號積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前混合訊號CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.混合訊號設計概述 2.連續時間濾波器 3.交換電容濾波器 4.交換電流濾波器 5.數位類比轉換器 6.類比數位轉換器 7.超取樣積分三角類比數位轉換器 8.管線式類比數位轉換器 9.混合訊號積體電路佈局
description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

name.en: Special Topics on Fire Protection Management

description.zh: 本課程主要教授防火管理基本架構，包含燃燒理論，火災特性，防火區劃，防火生活圈，防火計劃與防火管理組織等，並藉由制度化之管理手段技巧教授學生了解防火管理之目的與方法。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on basic concept of fire protection , such as characteristics of fire , district of fire protection , plan and management of fire etc.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.
