Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.

name.zh: 車輛工程產業與環境管理
name.en: Vehicle Engineering Business Management and the Environment

description.zh: 產業環境隨著社會經濟活動的頻繁而愈趨複雜。尤其是車輛工程產業，面臨到自政府機關、環保團體、社區團體的壓力，希望該產業的營運能確實達到維持生態環境的永續性。現今產業的營運，不僅要考量國內各個環境層面，也需顧及國際整體環境。目前環境議題整合產業管理決策規劃，對於相關產業更是一大挑戰。本課程主要希望學生透過產業個案的研討去(1)確認問題、分析情況、進而從產業環境著手問題的解?方向(2)評估、規劃與執行產業管理決策。確保產業營運與環境的永續共生。
description.en: The environment of business enterprise is far more complex than before.  Firms, especially vehicle engineering business, are feeling increased pressure from government regulations, environmental organizations, and community groups to ensure that business practices comply with the rule of Mother Nature.  Today's organizations need to concern the changing environment in not only the national dimension but also the international dimension.  On the other hand, the increasing attentions in environmental issues create new set challenges in management and strategic planning.  This course is designed for students who expect to undertake vehicle engineering business management in their career paths.  It is designed to enable you from each case study to (1) identify, analyze, and resolve problems from business environment, and (2) formulate, implement, and evaluate managerial and related strategies at the level of the business unit.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

name.en: Mitigation of Soil and Water Hazards

description.zh: 本課程將包含土壤沖蝕、小流域流量之推求、模型理論、輸砂理論、防洪工程、排水工程、土石流、防災技術、減災與偵測及專題討論。
description.en: Introduction; Soil erosion; Rational formula; Sediment transport; Flood control; Drainage engineering; Debris flow; Techniques of disaster prevention; Seminar.

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 科學視算指的是將大量的運算資料、監測結果或實驗數據，結合電腦繪圖以視覺化的方式呈現出來，幫助研究者進一步瞭解大量數據背後所代表的工程意義，在本課程中將介紹科學視算的原理，教導所使用的軟體工具和繪圖函式庫，讓學生有機會瞭解科學視算在土木工程上的應用，並以案例介紹科學視算的用途，如結構物的地震振動反應、震波在地層中的傳遞狀況、地形特徵和GPS資料的視覺化模擬、以及板塊運動的模擬情形等。本課程先修課程為程式設計，並且最好具備有限元素法的概念，建議研究所同學選修。
description.en: Scientific visualization is the use of computer graphics to visually represent the composite meaning of the large amount of data obtained by scientific computation, extensive monitoring, or engineering experiments. It could help researchers quickly grasp the engineering implications in their field of interest. This course will introduce the basic theory of scientific visualization, teach the relevant programming skills, and demonstrate how to apply the principles of scientific visualization to civil engineering problems. Examples include the seismic response of engineering structures, the propagation of seismic waves in the ground, and the movement of tectonic plates. The prerequisite of this course is computer programming. It is suitable for graduate students to choose as an elective.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程探討各種電腦網路的應用程式介面，以及網路應用系統的設計與撰寫方式，並透過課程專題製作，實作各種網路應用系統。其內容包含1. TCP/IP, TCP, UDP, Socket, RPC, and related RFCs, 2. Client/Server Model, 3. Process, Thread, and Synchronization, 4. WWW, CGI, and Database Connectivity, 5. CORBA, RMI, and DCOM。
description.en: This course discusses the application programming interfaces for computer networks. In addition, the design and programming methodology of network application systems are studied. Students will be required to complete a term programming project that implements network application systems. Course Contents: 1. TCP/IP, TCP, UDP, Socket, RPC, and related RFCs, 2. Client/Server Model, 3. Process, Thread, and Synchronization, 4. WWW, CGI, and Database Connectivity, 5. CORBA, RMI, and DCOM.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 本課程將基本物理化學原理應用在材料科學上，探討電子組態、化學鍵及晶體結構間之關係。內容包括晶體結構、X 光繞射分析、相平衡、材料之光學及電學性質及材料表面之鑑定及分析。
description.en: This subject covers the basic principles of physical chemistry and shows how they apply in describing the behavior of the solid state. The relationship between electronic structure, chemical bonding and crystal surface is developed. Attention is also given to characterization of atomic and molecular arrangements in materials as well as quantum optical and electrical effects in nanoscale materials.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程講授重點為介紹?維至三維?米材?及其生物醫學及各高科技產業的應用。內容包含合成與製備方法、先進?米製程與?米檢測技術，以及探討?米材?優?的性能，包括?米粉體、?米碳管、?米模板之製備，以及?米自組裝?米加工最新技術。
description.en: The objective of this course is to understand the synthesis, characterization and application of zero to three dimension nanomaterials. And also introduction the unique properties of nanomaterials and their potential applications of different industrial field. Teaching contents including the process of nanopowders, carbon nanotube nano-templates, and technology of the self-assembly and nano-fabrication, etc.

description.zh: 能源工程主要為介紹現有能源供應系統包含熱能及電能，上課的內容為包含熱流原理導論及再生能源、傳統火力電廠與汽電共生系統的系統原理介紹。
description.en: The concepts of thermal energy and electrical energy will be included in the Energy Engineering; the different energy system which will be introduced is as follows: renewable energy, traditional thermal power plant and cogeneration power system.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

description.zh: 探討數位化測驗與評量之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括有數位化測驗與評量之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、設計與發展、系統、教學管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。另外尚包括數位化另類評量，如電子化學習檔案、數位化檔案評量、數位化概念圖、電腦化同儕互評等。
description.en: To explore theories, design and practical application of digital test and asessment including their theortical fundamentals, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, design and development, system, instructional management, practical cases, and future trends etc...Moreover, digital alternative assessments such as e-portfolio, digital portfolio assessment, digital concept map, and computer-based peer assessment are also included.

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

name.zh: 技職教育政策理論與方法
name.en: Theoretical and Methodological Study on Policy of  VTE

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討技職教育政策之理論及方法，並期培養學生運用相關理論剖析技職教育議題。
description.en: The course focuses on discussing the theory and methodology of policy in vocational and technological education (VTE). Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: 本課程為銜接"相平衡"之進階課程，使學生學習在晶體及材料合成、製程及應用，甚至回收時，所發生之擴散及非擴散相變現象與機制；探討成核與成長機制及其反應速率；並探討非平衡相變在實際材料冶煉、合成及加工製程上之應用。課程大綱1.	相圖及非平衡相2.	擴散理論3.	晶體界面與微結構4.	凝固---成核與成長機制及速率5.	固相中之擴散相變6.	非擴散相變7.	燒結現象與理論
description.en: 1.	Phase diagrams and nonequilibrium phases2.	Diffusion3.	Crystal Interfaces and microstructure4.	Solidification-nucleation rate and growth rate5.	Diffusional transformations in solids6.	Diffusionless transformations7.	sintering phenomena and theory

description.zh: 電化學的領域包羅萬象，舉凡電泳作用與腐蝕現象的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了講述基本的電化學原理外，將著重於電化學分析方法在化學系統研究上的應用。
description.en: The field of electrochemistry includes many different phenomena (e.g., electrophoresis and corrosion), devices (electro analytical sensors and batteries), and technologies (the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electrochemical methods to the study of chemical systems.

description.zh: 近年來，台灣太陽能晶片產業蓬勃發展。本課程針對太陽能產業需求，內容將包括下列主題： 	太陽光之強度與光譜特性  	幾何光學簡介 	集光系統介紹 	LightTools光學軟體介紹(上機模擬) 	Fresnel透鏡(上機模擬) 	反射式集光系統(上機模擬)   	太陽能晶片光伏轉換原理 	太陽能電池的能量轉換效率 	太陽能晶片之抗反射鍍膜(AR-coating) 	LightTools光學軟體之抗反射鍍膜(上機模擬) 	輻射度學與光度學 	非成像光學系統之集光器建立(上機模擬) 	集光器之表面特性建立(上機模擬) 	太陽能晶面照度模擬器分析(上機模擬) 	集光光學系統之專利分析 	太陽之季節性光強分析 	太陽光之追日系統分析 	集光光學系統之建立(上機模擬) 	複合光伏集光系統之綜合分析(上機模擬)
description.en: The Course will comprise the fellows： 	Glossary of Terms and Units of Solar Energy 	Basics of Solar Radiation 	Solar UV and Ozone Layer 	Spectral Irradiance Data 	Solar Simulators 	Simulation of Solar Irradiation 	Radiometry and Photometry 	Introduction to LightTools Optical Software 	Tracking methods of Solar Energy 	Simulation of Solar Tracking System 	Principles of Photovoltaic Device 	Surface Characteristics of the Solar Cell 	Thin film AR-coating for Solar Cell 	Simulation of AR-Coating with LightTools 	Refractive and Reflective Type Concentrator 	Definition of Concentration Ratio 	Simulation of Fresnel Lens 	Simulation of Cessagrain Type Concentrator 	Compound Parabolic Concentrator

name.zh: 流行家具設計專案研究
name.en: The Contemporary Furniture Design Project Research

description.zh: 流行家具設計專案包含家具流行趨勢研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward furniture design project focused on trend research and design practice under supervision of the director. Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive trend research.

description.zh: 介紹當代應用於設計研究和發展自設計研究的各種重要理論，當作博碩士生研究與創作的準備。內容包括將設計視為目標導向、賦予價值的一般性問題解決活動，以及將設計視為檢驗溝通傳達過程與模式的調查研究，幫助研究生綜覽各種知識傳統下的設計理論，有效掌握並發展特定研究主題的適當理論與方法。
description.en: Introduction of contemporary theories applied to and developed in design research, in which design is considered as a mode of inquiry, including examination of communication process and models, and emphasizing general problem-solving as a goal-directed, value-laden activity.

name.en: Practice of Survey Research in Design

description.zh: 課程中介紹調查研究的涵義，發展及進行程序。針對設計相關議題，實際演練調查研究的設計，實施，資料分析以及報告撰寫。
description.en: Introduction to the connotation, development and procedure of Survey Research. A survey research which is focusing on the design related issues is to be accomplished.

description.zh: 地質學是自然科學的一門，是研究地球這個人類所居住的星球自生成以來，組成的物質成分與結構之變化的科學。由於地質學主要是由現在所觀察得到的自然現象去推論現在地球中岩石的組成與結構，並用逆推(Retrodiction)的推論來解釋過去發生在地球之中的各種變化。因此野外觀察為地質學研究的最基本工作。在野外觀察時所用的方法與所依據的原則與理論，即是野外地質學學習的重點。本課程之內容除複習野外地質學與地質調查的一般觀念及基本原理，包括野外地質學導論，火成岩、沉積岩與變質岩地區的地質現象與地質調查的方法外，還將進一步建立區域地質圖測製的能力，以便未來能將地質調查的能力應用於各個相關領域。
description.en: Geologic fieldwork is the basic ability for all geological studies, whether they are simply intended to describe the rocks by various field methods, or whether they form the basis of interpretive studies based upon laboratory analysis of rock samples and geochemical and geophysical data collected in the field. Such data cannot be interpreted without detailed observations of the field relationships between collected samples and of the geology of areas in which measurements were made.Professer Tucker had said that "The study of field geology is often an exciting and rewarding occupation. However, to get the most out of these rocks, it is necessary to undertake precise and accurate fieldwork. The secret of successful fieldwork is a keen eye for detail and an enquiring mind. Be observant, see everything in the outcrop, then think about the things seen and look again."This course is designed as advanced training to field observation, description and geologic mapping for graduate student

description.zh: 介紹晶體的各種完美結構，缺陷結構的形成與各種物理特性的相互關係，電子的波動與粒子之性質，電子於自由電子能量井，固態中行為與能帶觀念之介紹，固態材料的鬆散行為，固態的介電性質。
description.en: An introduction to Solid-State Physics in materials science.

name.zh: 流行生活用品設計概論

description.zh: 講述知識性內容包括瞭解文化、趨勢、生活型態、科技發展等設計背景元素。介紹設計理論，深入探討產品與使用者之關係、產品使用情境與產品語言(product language)、環境因素與社會背景、產品診斷、以及非物質設計因素。
description.en: Lecture on culture study, trend, life-style and technology development. A Brief introduction to theory of design including impact of environmental factors and social background, product clinic, usability, and universal design.

description.zh: 具有好的設計構想並不容易，因為它真的挑戰是靠實際地去執行它的創新策略及內涵。而設計創新專案面臨日趨專業及複雜化之趨勢，相對地優質的產品創新已不容許次級產品的存在空間。設計管理者必須運用前瞻具差異的眼光主動發展並整合專案內外多元專業之資源，並以品牌行銷的策略為前導，規劃並有效地管理專案。本課程重點：1.	以品牌行銷為導向之創新管理的架構與多元專業之定位。2.	有關知識與技巧之準則。3.	創新專案之規劃、組織、推行與監督。
description.en: Having good product ideas is not easy, but the real challenge is lies in carrying out ideas through a practical product innovation strategy and its embodiment. Problems within design innovation is increasingly facing the state of more complexity and professions, successful design may effectively preserve to have differentiated marketing and design vision organizing capable multidisciplinary teams both inner and outside of cooperate resource.This course may focus on:1.The framework for innovation.2.The model establishment of brand and experimental marketing orientated innovation management with regard to the placement of multidisciplinary team.3.Criteria development for both related knowledge and skills.4.Planning, organizing, implementing, monitoring and evaluating design innovation.5.The need for adoptability in organization.

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

description.zh: 從性別研究的角度來看產品設計中的刻版印象，並提出創新設計的可能性
description.en: Look at the stereotypes within the products from a perspective of gender studies and come up with new ideas for creation.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 碩二材資館5樓電化教室

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

name.en: Modular Talks by Prestigious Scientific or Industrial Pionee

description.zh: 本課程每學期擬邀請科技或產業界傑出人士5-6位，在其專業領域進行為期2-3週的專題講課；主要是為了拓展博碩士生進入職場前的視野，對年輕學生給予指標式的誘導與激勵。
description.en: Modular serial talks are designed for senior-level or PhD-program postgraduate students. The high-power speakers will be strictly selected and invited either from scientific organizations or from industry. The course aims to broaden students' vision on various professional aspects, as well as to inspire their creactivities both in research and development.

description.zh: 1. 電力系統經濟調度2. 傳輸損失3. 機組規劃4. 水火力機組協調5. 發電控制6. 電力系統互聯7. 電力系統安全度8. 狀態評估
description.en: 1. Economic dispatch of power system2. transmission losses3. Unit commitment4. coordination of hydro-thermal generators5. generation control6. inter-connected power systems7. Security of power system8. State estimation

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

description.zh: 1. 電力與能源2.節能與儲能 3.能源應用與環境4.能源監控技術5.能源管制技術 6.能源管理
description.en: 1. Power and Energy 2.Energy Control and Storage3.Energy Application and Environment4.Energy Monitoring Technology 5.Energy Control Technology 6.Energy Managements.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解排隊理論之基本概念及分析方法，並據以分析通訊網路或計算機網路之效能。課程內容包含：(1)排隊理論簡介 (2)相關機率理論 (3)基本排隊模式 (4)各種排隊模式分析 (5)排隊理論應用於各種通訊網路及計算機網路之效能分析。
description.en: This course contains the Introduction of Queueing Theory, Related probability theory, Fundamental Queueing models, Queueing models analysis: M/M/1, M/M/c, M/E/1, M/G/1, G/M/1 etc. This course also contains the performance evaluation of communications networks and computer networks based on the queueing theory.

name.zh: 電腦在營建管理之應用
name.en: The Application of Computer in Construction Management

description.zh: 本課程主要自營建工程專案之觀點，介紹一些常用營建專案管理方法之基本原理及其在電腦上之應用實例。課程內容將包含營建專案之進度、成本、品質等基本管理概念與營建管理理論於專案管理之初步應用，使學生能實際地學習如何將電腦應用在營建工程專案管理(內容包括：工程排程、成本估算與控制、電腦模擬、與工程風險管理分析等方法)。
description.en: The application of computer in construction managementThe basic knowledge in computer, the basic design thought and current system practical training in Chinese-English word process system , the functional explain and application in EXCEL, the basic concept in information management system , the basic concept in engineer information management system , the design of database and database software system's practice, simple application in statistics drafting software and other current computer's technology development and other application in construction management.

name.zh: 基礎工程監測及檢測評估
name.en: In-situ Testing and Monitoring in Foundation Engineering

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。
介紹國內外"都市防災基本計畫"之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

description.zh: 類比系統、數位系統設計、數位控制及微處理機、介面程式設計、程式語言及軟體等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Analogy systems, Digital systems designed, Digital control and microprocessors, Interface programming design, Computer programming, software and Lab.

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究. 有關科技開發案之技術開發管理, 人力責任管理及時間任務管理等PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action)之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: 簡介﹙廣義的逆向工程系統、狹義的逆向工程系統﹚，數位擷取設備﹙接觸式探頭、非接觸式探頭﹚，曲面模型﹙電腦圖學簡史、3D電腦繪圖、Bezier曲線、NURBS曲線曲面﹚，逆向工程軟體之功能，電腦輔助檢驗，軟硬體整合與實作。
description.en: Introduction, Digitizing Devices (Tactile Probes, Non-contact Probes), Surface Modeling (Computer Graphics, 3D Rendering, Bezier Curve, NURBS Surface),Curve and Surface Editing, Computer Aided Verification.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的系統及方法。包括：三D工件建圖、設計計算及分析、製造實驗及分析、軟體寫作、網路、NC程式寫作、製程模擬、智慧型製程控制及優化、電腦整合製造系統。
description.en: Introducing the system and methods about computer aided design and manufacturing. Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 本課程提供理工學者撰寫科技論文之英文寫作技巧與指導，內容包括：扼要複習英文文法，詳細說明撰寫英文研究報告或論文時常犯的錯誤，深入討論標準英文寫作風格與修辭原則，提供簡易而有效的實作原則以提昇科技論文的可讀性。
description.en: This course develops a curriculum providing students with an English writing skill and direction focused on technical essays, including the followings : 1. Concise review of English grammars2. Frequent writing mistakes of essays or reports3. Deep discussion concerning standard English writing style and rhetoric principles4. Offering simple and practical writing principles to increase the readability of technology essays.

notes: 機電所碩一同學98第二學期修習

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

name.zh: 全球製造體系協同系統特論
name.en: Special Topic on Collaborative Systems for Global Manufactur

description.zh: 第一部分是針對製造業內部運作時所需的Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)系統平台與Product Data Management (PDM)系統平台所提供的功能進行介紹，並進行實作演練。第二部分則是針對資訊系統整合之概念、架構與相關技術，包括Application Programming Interface (API)、Enterprise Application Integration (EAI)、Master Data Management (MDM)、Web Service、Agent等進行說明。第三部分則是針對建立協同系統時所需之相關核心平台所提供的功能進行介紹，並進行實作演練。
description.en: This course contains three main portions. First, the core intranet systems applied to most manufacturers, such as ERP and PDM systems are introduced and practiced. Second, the concepts, frameworks, and technologies for system integrations, such as API, EAI, MDM, Web Service, and Agent are explained. Finally, the kernel system utilized to construct collaborative systems for global manufacturing operations is introduced and practiced. The objective of this course is to make students to familiar with various platforms for constructing global collaborative systems

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意工程最佳化方法導論，線性規畫法，非線性規畫法，多目標函數最佳化，近代數學規畫法介紹，機械元件與系統之最佳設計
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods,Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization,Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Technigues,Optimum Design of Mechanical Components and Systems

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介2. 隨機程序3. 數位調變與多工技術4. 最佳接收器5. 載波與符碼同步6. 消息理論7. 訊源編碼8. 通道編碼9. 展頻通訊系統10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

description.zh: 本課程授課主要分成六項：（1）從都市歷史發展，討論過去、現在與未來；（2）以永續都市發展理論，探討都市型態及設計理論；（3）以都市空間的構成探討解讀、架構及產生的理論；（4）以都市空間的形成探討社會過程、技術過程及創造過程：（5）以都市實質設計的涵構探討都市的實質、自然及人文設計，並藉以討論土地使用、開放空間、建築形式與量體、流通動線、停車場、街道家具及支持活動等；（6）以都市設計的技術探討主要計畫、細部計畫、都市計畫通盤檢討、都市更新、土地使用分區管制及都市景觀管制等技術性課題
description.en: The subject is hereby divided into six parts (1) discussing the past, present and future from standpoint of the chronicle of urban development; (2) exploring the urban pattern and design theory be referring to on-going urban development; (3) inquiring into the theory of formation, configuration and generation and urban space; (4) searching the social process, technical process and creation process through the formation of urban space; (5) from the virtual, natural and cultural design to review the proper layout of land use, open space, building pattern and volume, flow dynamic line, parking lot, road, furniture and support for citizen activity; (6) technically reviewing the main urban plan, detail plan, overall review of urban plan, urban renewal, land use, zone control and urban landscape.

name.en: Special Topics on Indoor Environment Quality

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生深入探討最新的室內環境議題與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1.以單一類型的建築室內環境為探討主題；2.探討環境影響人體健康之最新研究議題；3.進行跨領域合作提出共同改善之策略及方法；4.學習各項環境量測儀器之原理、操作與判讀能力；5.具備診斷與改善特殊室內環境議題之專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: In this course students are going to be taught how to discuss the relationship between indoor environment quality and human healthy in order to promote students' recognition and abilities to create healthy indoor environment.Contents :1. The indoor environment of single type of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Providing some strategies and methods to improve indoor environment quality through cooperating with other science field.4. Learning how to use instruments to evaluate indoor environment quality.5. Learning how to diagnose and improve the special topics of indoor environment quality.

description.zh: 本課程提供行動計算上一些主題之深入介紹，這些主題包括：(1)行動通訊及系統介紹，(2)資料管理(3)行動資料庫及交易管理(4)位置管理(5)行動IP(6)單一/多人路由(7)資訊安全
description.en: This course provides a comperhensive overview of several topics related to mobile computing. These topics includes:(1)State-of-Art in Mobile (2)Data Management (3)Mobile Database and Transaction Management (4)Location Management, (5)Mobile IP (6)Unicast/Multicast Routing,and(7)Security.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings. The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English , particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

name.zh: 積體電路實體設計演算法
name.en: Issues Related to Manufacturing and Reliability

description.zh: 介紹VLSI設計流程及技術地圖基本演算法分割平面規劃擺置、繞線(整體繞線、細部繞線)時脈及電線/接地繞線壓縮佈置後最佳化時序建模及最佳化訊號/電源完整性其它和製作及可靠度有關之議題
description.en: Design Flow of VLSI and Technology RoadmapBasic AlgorithmsPartitionFloorplanningPlacement and Routing (Global Routing, Detail Routing)Interconnection of Clock and Power/GroundOptimization for post-processingModeling and Optimization of TimingSignal Integrity

description.zh: 一.電力設備的故障二.比壓器,比流器三.保護電驛的構造及動作原理四.常用的保護電驛五.發電機與電動機的保護六.變壓器的保護七.線路保護八.異常電壓的預防九.熔絲十.保護協調
description.en: <一>INTRODUCTION<二>WHAT REALLY IS THE MVA METHOD<三>THE ABC OF THE MVA<四>WHY THE MVA METHOD<五>COMPARISON OF THREE METHODS<六>CAN PHASE-GROUND FAULT BE SOLVED <七>MVA METHODS FOR INSTANTANEOUS VOLTAGE ESTIMATE<八>THE SIMPLE COMPUTER TIME SHARE PROGRAM<九>CONCLUSION

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2.電力電子元件特性 3.元件與電路佈局4.元件特性與雜訊 5.元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計積体電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路佈局的能力,課程內容包念： 1. SOC設計介紹 2. SOC設計流程與工具 3. 以平台為基礎的SOC設計 4. 軟體應體共同設計 5. SIP設計介紹 6. 嵌入式RTOS 7. 混合模式設計 8. SOC測試與驗證 9. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of advanced FPGA system. Therefore, the student has the design capability of advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction to SOC Design 2. SOC Design Flow & Tools 3. Platforms Based SOC Design 4. Hardware/Software Co-design 5. Introduction to SIP Design 6. Embedded RTOS 7. Mixed-mode Design 8. SOC Testing & Verification 9. Case Study

description.zh: 中文內容概述: 本課程著重通訊工程中多種與電磁波相關元件之分析與設計，包括各式通訊高頻組件分析、輻射特性與導波特性研究、以及其他新型微波與毫米波頻段之電路與天線
description.en: This purpose of this course is to design and analysis the key components in communication engineering by using electromagnetics. It includes the network analysis of various wireless communication components, investigations of electromagnetic waves in the bounded and unbounded region, and other novel circuits and antennas in microwave and millimeter-wave frequency.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解數位影像之觀念及相關技術，並學習實際用高階語言實現數位影像處理之技術。內容包含：(1)介紹，(2)數位影像基礎，(3)空間域影像強化，(4)頻域影像強化，(5)影像還原，(6)彩色影像處理，(7)形態學影像處理，(8)影像分割，(9)小波與多解析處理，(10) 影像壓縮。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing. In addition, students will be using the high level language (C++, Java, Matlab etc.) to complete the programming of the corresponding techniques. The outline of this course is given below. (1) Introduction, (2) Digital Image Fundamentals, (3) Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain, (4) Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain, (5) Image Restoration, (6) Color Image Processing, (7) Morphological Image Processing, (8) Image Segmentation, (9) Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing, (10) Image Compression.

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹H∞的理論及如何以精簡易懂的數學工具掌握強健控制設計，進而認識H∞控制的物理特性及優缺點，並其他控制方法作比較。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the theory of H∞ and how to utilize the mathematical tool to design the H∞ controller. Besides, the physical meaning and the comparison with others control methods are also will be introduced in this course.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Special Topics on T-S Fuzzy Model

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹T-S fuzzy model的理論及其原理，首先介紹如何將一非線性系統藉由Fuzzy Modeling的方法，將其轉換成T-S Fuzzy Model，再以一有系統的方法設計控制器，並將穩定條件以LMI形式表示，最後利用所推導出的演算法，針對真實物理系統進行驗證。
description.en: In this course, the theory and principle of T-S fuzzy model are introduced. First, a procedure how to transform a nonlinear system to a T-S fuzzy model is introduced. Secondly, some systematic methods are introduced to design the controllers for the stability of the overall system and the stability condition is formulated by LMIs form. Finally, the design procedure is utilized to demonstrate by a real physical system.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋以下範圍：人類基因之組成、基因表達與疾病之關係、基因不穩定性與疾病之相關、家譜基因、遺傳基因特色、 癌症基因、與致病基因尋求方法介紹: 核酸雜交法、定序分析、聚合?鏈反應、體外基因誘變等.
description.en: Lectures are concerned with the following topics: Organization of the human genome, human gene expression, instability of the human genome, genes in pedigrees, genetic mapping of mendelian characters, molecular pathology, cancer genetics. The methods are used to search the possible disease-cause gene, will be introduced as following: physical and transcript mapping, nucleic acid hybridization assays, PCR, DNA sequencing and in vitro mutagenesis etc.

notes: 需具備高等分子生物學的先備知識基礎

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies.  Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

name.en: Special Topics on low energy building

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹低耗能建築之理論、技術與案例，課程內容包括降低建築物使用維護過程中能源消耗之各種方法，建築手法包括採光、通風、隔熱，機械手法包括太陽能與風力利用等，配合案例解說以瞭解低耗能建築實務之應用。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to introduce theory, technique and case study of low energy building that include energy consumption method in the usage and maintenance for building life-cycle, which includes daylight, ventilation, insulation that is passive method, solar and renewable energy that is active method. Meanwhile the course will discuss some cases to understand the practicing for low energy building.

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 深耕趨勢學理論，以生活型態資訊為基礎，探討社會趨勢與科技發展趨勢，做為商品企畫的基礎。本課程旨在引導學習者運用學術研究的工具，以科學的方法定義市場需求，並以理性的思維進行商品企畫。
description.en: Current theories and practices of trend study are covered, including trends of living style, fashion and technology development followed by product planning practice. The aims of this course is to put emphasis on conducting research approach in the process of scientific marketing management and reasonable product planning.

description.zh: 本課程係提供博士生探索在設計領域中進行研究與建構知識的哲學基礎，碩士生經授課教師同意亦可選修。探討議題包括認識論、現象學、實用論、符號交互論與建構論，並比較設計研究與其它領域的研究。修課者將選讀哲學、認識論或理論的重要文獻，以及有關設計哲理的重要文獻，且將本課程的學習成果以參與學術活動或設計競賽等方式發表。
description.en: This is designated as a Doctoral course. Master students may join the course based on approval of the instructor. This course explores the philosophical basis for conducting research and building knowledge in the field of design. Topics to be explored may include core concepts from epistemology, phenomenology, pragmatism, symbolic interactionism and structuralism. Comparisons are made between design research and research in other fields. Each participant in the course will choose key readings: some from works in philosophy, epistemology or theory, and others related to discussions of philosophy in design. The readings may be a book in its entirety or selected chapters from a book that may present a philosophical argument or an extended discussion (of the nature of knowledge, time, actions, experience, cognition, context, technology, language, interactions, artifacts or objects), or one (or more) selected chapter(s) from a compendium or other edited collection of classic and contemporar

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生懂得基本的微生物學外，更將引導學生練習閱讀一些國外期刊的最新研究，內容包括：微生物分子遺傳、微生物免疫、微生物生理及微生物與藥物等知識。
description.en: This course will let students to learn basic microbiology; furthermore, will introduce students to learn how to read SCI journals and new knowledge in microbiology. It contains molecular genetics of microorganisms, immunology of microorganisms, physiology of microorganisms and the relationships between microorganisms and drugs.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Planning

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態規劃理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套規劃操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。 1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態規劃理論的應用 a. 都市地區和鄉村地區 b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and planning in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Planning" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows; 1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology 2. Ecological planning theory 3. The application of ecological theory in landscape practice a. Urban region and countryside b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前環境議題與強化有關環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。故本課程主要內容包括：一、緒論 二、環境決策 三、環境保護政策 四、永續發展 五、達到良好環境規劃與設計的可能途徑 六、環境規劃與設計的專業實務練習 七、結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of current environmental issues, and further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1.Introduction 2.Environmental decision-making 3.Environmental protection policy 4.Sustainable development 5.Alternative approaches to environmental planning and design. 6.Professional practice of environmental planning and design 7.Conclusions

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 先修課程：半導體元件物理﹙4005032﹚。本課程著重於IC製程技術之學習。課程內容包括：IC絕緣技術、模組製程技術、導線技術、整合工程技術、SOC技術及半導體奈米元件技術等。
description.en: A study on advanced IC process. The contents cover IC isolation technology, module process, interconnection line process, process integration, SOC applications and CMOS nano device engineering etc.

description.zh: 本課程之要旨在於建構高科技產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場預測擴展之研究能力。課程中引用各種研究方法及預測手法並以個案探討方式配合。
description.en: The objective of this course is to construct the infrastructure of high technology industry analysis and to build up the research capability. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 本課程首先探討競爭優勢與生產系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、 競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。進而以精實思維(lean thinking)為基礎，探討實現精實企業體的方向及議題，包括精實之基本步驟:消除浪費、暢流、後拉、完善，精實思考架構:理念 流程、員工與事業夥伴、解決問題。 基礎工具如價值溪流圖(value stream mapping)等將用來案例實作。
description.en: In this course, we first cover the linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models. Topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. Then, the course will explore the approaches and issues of realizing lean enterprise based on lean thinking. Topics included are the basic steps to become lean and the framework of lean thinking. The basic steps to become lean are wastes removing, smoothing, pull and perfection. The framework of lean thinking is often depicted as the 4P model: philosophy, processes, partnership, and problem solving.  Basic tools such as value stream mapping will be introduced.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的迅速發展，網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷通路以外的一個新興通路。再加上網路全年無休、成本低廉、以全球為市場的優勢，以及可符合消費者的需求的特色，使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流，因此國外廠商紛紛上網卡位，網路商業化已成為一股不可抵擋的趨勢。本課程中將介紹對電子商務作理論與實務上的探討。1. 電子商務與商業模式2. 電子商務策略發展3. B to C電子商務4. C to C電子商務5. B to B電子商務6. 無線網路7. 企業電子化8. 企業資源規劃9. 供應鏈管理10. 顧客關係管理11知識管理與e-Learning12. 網路行銷14. 網路廣告與關鍵字廣告15. 網路安全性
description.en: E-business (electronic business) is the conducting of business on the Internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners.The outline of electronic business is as following:1. Introduction to Electronic Commerce.2. Technology Infrastructure: The Internet and the World Wide Web.3. Selling on the Web: Revenue Models and Building a Web Presence.4. Marketing on the Web.5. Business-to-Business Online Strategies6. Online Auctions, Virtual Communities, and Web Portals.7. The Environment of Electronic Commerce: Legal, Ethical, and Tax Issues.8. Web Server Hardware and Software.9: Electronic Commerce Software.10. Electronic Commerce Security.11. Payment Systems for Electronic Commerce.12. Planning for Electronic Commerce

name.zh: 人類資訊處理理論與應用
name.en: Human Information Processing Theories and Applications

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解人類認知過程之資訊處理理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用這些理論與模式來探討與提升整體系統之績效。
description.en: The purpose of the course is for students to learn about theories and models of human information processing with the consideration of task and environment characteristics, and to learn how to apply these theories and models for investigating and improving overall system performance.

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新"以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，管理思維更要突破創新，以有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。本課程以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，搭配四階品質機能展開，詳細介紹工程技術如何落實創新與管理實務創新如何執行。本課程適用於自有品牌業者、ODM或OEM製造業者、服務業者與學術單位教學研究，特點如下:完整詳實闡述TRIZ理論並輔以大量簡單案例說明TRIZ概念、工程TRIZ實務案例10餘個與TRIZ工程與管理之參數與創新原則說明簡例約800餘個，管理實務案例20餘個，包含研發管理、服務業管理、專案管理與生產管理等。案例與簡例最多，創新執行力可快速上手與實施應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in Product R&D, engineering, and management tactic in a innovative thinking manner. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 30 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, Project management, Service industry management, and Production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

name.zh: 進階家具與室內設計(一)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Furniture and Interior Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 英文授課,僅限碩士班40人選修

description.zh: 一、 簡介二、 數學模式三、 小信號干擾之系統響應四、 同步機之模擬五、 同步機之線性模式六、 激磁系統七、 激磁對穩定度之影響八、 多機組系統之穩定度
description.en: 一、 Introduction二、 The Mathematical Model三、 System response to small disturbances四、 The simulation of synchronous machines五、 Linear Models of synchronous machines六、 Excitation System七、 Effect of excitation on stability八、 Multimachine Systems with constant Impedance loads

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2.雷射基本原理  3.各種雷射介紹  4.雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用
description.en: The lectures will cover the fundamental aspects of laser physics and engineering of lasers of all kinds, including ray tracing, Gaussian beams, principles of the optical cavities design and analysis...etc. The lecture outline is as follows:1.Basic optics  2. Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

description.zh: 針對存貨理論之簡單介紹，課程內容為確定性模式之經濟批量，連續性與週期性盤點策略，動態性模型與多階段系統。
description.en: Introduced simply in view of the goods in stock theory, curriculum content economy of batch for definite pattern, continuous and periodic inventory strategy, dynamic model and multi-stage system.

description.zh: 本課程藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Universal Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 國內外認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案，著重於創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成, 以科技整合, 人因互動,研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course provides study of ergonomics und interaction design related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the project will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討ERP之觀念、架構、要素與管理課題。本課程將以標竿ERP軟體實作為基礎，認識企業資源規劃之架構、組成與企業基本流程，進而探討與ERP相關之管理課題, 如 企業經營模式(Business models)， 企業流程模式(Business Process Models)，ERP選擇，ERP 導入專案，ERP與企業電子化 ， 等。
description.en: The course is concerned with concepts, framework, elements, and managerial issues of ERP.The course will introduce the framework and elements of ERP and fundamental business processes through the actual practice on a benchmark ERP package. The managerial issues related to ERP such as Business models， Business Process Models，ERP selection， ERP implementation project ，ERP vs. e-Business will be covered.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於討論資源開發進行中及開發後所可能對環境造成之衝擊以及如何因應之對策，其中包括空氣、水、噪音及震動等之控制方法。對於開發後之土地復整及二次利用亦在本課程討論之列。
description.en: This class is to discuss the impact of the mining operations to the environment and how these problem can be resolved.  It includes air, water, noise and vibration controls.  It also discuss the mine reclamation and secondary usage of mined land.

description.zh: 從闡述各種汽車共生系統在特定的工業製程，商業智慧型大樓或大學校園區域網路型式等能源有效利用的整合規劃設計，主要課程內容為： 1.汽車共生系統概念 2.熱力循環的技術理論 3.多元化的原動機利用 4.複合循環發電廠 5.都會型汽電共生利用 6.汽電共生的能源管理 7.汽電共生的環境管理 8.各種熱電轉換裝置 9.高級能源轉換科技之汽電共生
description.en: By studying this course, the following terms can be identified, defined, used: 1.The Concept of Cogeneration system 2.Theory of Cogeneration Technology. 3.Combined cycles plant. 4.Heating and cooling integration with power generation. 5.The Design Concept and Demonstrated economic performance of cogen. sys. 6.Social and Environmental management of cogen. sys. 7.Conversion Method and Technology on advanced system.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 探討數位化測驗與評量之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括有數位化測驗與評量之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、設計與發展、系統、教學管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。另外尚包括數位化另類評量，如電子化學習檔案、數位化檔案評量、數位化概念圖、電腦化同儕互評等。
description.en: To explore theories, design and practical application of digital test and asessment including their theortical fundamentals, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, design and development, system, instructional management, practical cases, and future trends etc...Moreover, digital alternative assessments such as e-portfolio, digital portfolio assessment, digital concept map, and computer-based peer assessment are also included.

name.zh: 網路學習社群專題研究
name.en: Special Topic on Web-Based Learning Community

description.zh: 探討網路學習社群之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習社群之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、環境、形成要素、成員角色與任務、線上討論與知識分享、成功因素、經營管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore advnced issues on Web-based learning community (WBCL)including WBCL theoretical fundamental, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, environment, formed factors, member roles and tasks, online discussion, successful factors, operation and management, practical cases, and future trrnds etc..

description.zh: 本課程希望讓學生了解如何正確選擇與使用多變項統計方法，並能閱讀、呈現與解釋多變項統計報告或結果。課程包括因子設計、實驗設計、共變數分析、複迴歸等主題，以探討教育研究中多重且同時的影響因素。
description.en: This curriculum lets students understand how to choose and use multi-variance statistics methods exactly.  It also includes that reading, presenting and explaining the report or result of multi-variance statistics analysis exactly.  The topics of the curriculum include that factor design, experimental design, covariance analysis, and multi-regression, al etc. to explore the influence of multi and simultaneous factors in the educational research.

name.zh: 太陽能發電技術與應用

description.zh: 太陽能是再生能源之一，本課程介紹太陽光熱能轉換和光電能轉換兩大領域，包括太陽能熱水器、太陽能爐，太陽能房，太陽能乾燥，太陽能溫室，太陽能製冷空調，太陽能發電及太陽光電發電系統…等，使學習者有一完整太陽能技術與應用的觀念。
description.en: Solar energy is one of renewable energy，the aim of this course to discuss the Solar energy has divided two field as Heating-transformation and Photovoltaic-transformation, include solar-heater、solar-furnace、solar-house、 solar-dryer、solar-warmhouse、 solar air-conditioning、solar energy electric generation and solar photovoltaic system…etc.。Let students have a complete concept of solar energy technology and application。

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。
description.en: The primary object of this course is to present the fundamental concept and treatment for spatial signal processing dealing with interference encountered in wirelwss communication by using an adaptive array. It is also the additional purpose of the subjects to provide the analllytic techniques used to predict the performance in other new applications.

description.en: 1.An Introduction to Embedded Computing System 2.Introduction and Implementation to the Kernel of Real-time System 3.CPUs 4.Introducion to the Embedded Computing Platform 5.Hardware Acce;eratprs 6.Design of the Drivers 9.Networks and Distributed Embedded Systems 10.Embeddeed Web-based Design and Implementation.

description.zh: 1.基礎傳輸線理論2.耦合3.非理想的傳輸線效應4.構裝、連接器與穿接腳5.電源供應系統6.電子電路的模擬

description.zh: 中文內容概述: 本課程著重通訊工程中多種與電磁波相關元件之分析與設計，包括各式通訊高頻組件分析、輻射特性與導波特性研究、以及其他新型微波與毫米波頻段之電路與天線
description.en: This purpose of this course is to design and analysis the key components in communication engineering by using electromagnetics. It includes the network analysis of various wireless communication components, investigations of electromagnetic waves in the bounded and unbounded region, and other novel circuits and antennas in microwave and millimeter-wave frequency.

description.zh: 一、被動積體電路元件二、半導體元件物理概述三、被動電阻電感電容網路四、傳輸線理論概述五、史密斯圖與散射參數六、射頻放大器設計七、參考電壓與偏壓八、雜音九、低雜音放大器設計十、混波器十一、射頻功率放大器十二、鎖相迴路十三、振盪器十四、相位雜音十五、發射與接收系統架構
description.en: 1.Passive IC Components 2.Review of Semiconductor Physics 3.Passive RLC Networks 4.Review of Traansmission Line Theory5.Smith Chart and S-Paramenters 6.RF Amplifier Design 7.Voltage References and Biasing 8.Noise 9.LNA Design 10.Mixers 11.RF Power Amplifiers 12.Phase-Locked Loops 13.Oscillatros 14.Phase Noise 15.Transmitter and Receiver Architectures

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

description.zh: 本課程概述一些動機源自於生物學的計算方法及知識，並以特定之應用領域來說明演化計算方法，其內容包括：1) 計算智慧2) 模擬退火法3) 演化計算概論4) 基因演算法（搜尋算子、搜尋方式、利基技術、限制處理）5) 蟻群系統6) 物群智慧7) 演化多目標最佳化8) 基因規劃9) 演化策略10) 共同演化11) 類免疫系統
description.en: An overview of emerging biologically motivated computational intelligence paradigms and hand-on working knowledge with specific application domains and with focus on evolutionary algorithms: Topics include, but not limited to, 1) computational intelligence; 2) simulated annealing; 3) introduction to evolutionary computation; 4) genetic algorithms (search operators, search schemes, niching, constraint handling); 5) ant colony system; 6) particle swarm intelligence; 7) evolutionary multiobjective optimization; 8) genetic programming; 9) evolutionary strategy; 10) co-evolution; 11) artificial immune system; and 12) social based algorithm.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機械設計原理、機密機械特有設計考慮、機械結構件之靜態、動態、與熱傳分析。機械次系統單元如主軸單元、動力驅動、進給驅動、與控制系統等之設計與分析。機械之精度與效能分析。工具機之實務設計與分析個案研究。
description.en: Principles of machine design. Special design considerations in precision machinery. Static dynamic, and thermal analysis of structural members of machine. Analysis of sub-unit of machine like spindle unit, power drive unit, feed drive unit, and control system, etc. Accuracy and performance evaluation of machine, Case study with special emphasis on machine tool.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用3D繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops
