description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

name.zh: 行動電話通訊網路工程實務

description.zh: 本課程旨在增進電機工程研究所學生對行動電話通訊網路工程實務之了解與分析設計之實作能力，期望學生之所學能與產業科技發展的脈動同步。 內容主要包括：(一)	電信基本概要簡介(二)	行動電話通訊系統之演進與發展(三) 蜂巢式行動電話基本網路架構與功能(四) 臺灣GSM網路運作實例研討(五) 無線網路之規劃設計與工程實務(1)信號涵蓋之電腦模擬與路測技術(2)通話流量與系統容量分析(3)頻率規劃與干擾研究(六) 系統優化與網路維運管理實務(七) 電信公司營運機房與網管中心實地參觀(八) 射頻規劃之電腦軟體模擬實驗: 在系裡經費許可之前提下提供學生實習網路規劃
description.en: This course aims to improve EE graduate student's knowledge in mobile telecommunication networks with emphasis on the engineering practice, as well as to train the students to be able to design and analyze the mobile telecommunication networks. The course content includes the following:(1)	Fundamentals of Telecommunications(2)	Mobile telecom systems evolution and future trend(3)	Cellular network structure and functions(4)	Taiwan GSM networks case study(5)	Wireless networks planning, design and engineering practice1.	RF planning: computer simulation and road test 2.	Traffic and capacity analysis3.	Frequency planning and interference study(6)	System optimization and network management(7)	Site-visiting to Telecomm company's operation center(8)	Planning/design simulation using computer software if funding is allowed.

description.zh: 最小平方法，最大可能法，自動遞迴模型，馬可夫參數估測，狀態空間實現，時域數據的系統判別，頻域數據的系統判別
description.en: Least Square Method, Maximum Likelihood Method, Auto Regressive Model, Estimation of Markov Parameter, State-Space Realization, System Identification based on Time Domain Test Data, System Identification based on Frequency Domain Test Data.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 1.嵌入式計算系統簡介 2.即時系統核心之介紹與設計 3.中央處理器4.嵌入式平台簡介 5.硬體加速器 6.驅動器的設計 7.網路與分散式嵌入式系統 8.嵌入式網路基礎架構系統設計與實作。
description.en: 1.An Introduction to Embedded Computing System 2.Introduction and Implementation to the Kernel of Real-time System 3.CPUs 4.Introducion to the Embedded Computing Platform 5.Hardware Acce;eratprs 6.Design of the Drivers 9.Networks and Distributed Embedded Systems 10.Embeddeed Web-based Design and Implementation.

description.zh: 本課程從全球化觀念來探討品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以全新研究的品牌理論來探討全球品牌的重要關鍵議題，其中包括全球品牌與公司策略的關係與整合、整合品牌概念、新經濟時代的品牌觀念與全球營運模式、整合品牌的執行與評估。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of global branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, profits and non-profit organizations, domestic and global companies, and small and large business. Global Branding Management builds on Global branding Strategy, focusing on the major tactics and tools used by international marketers in managing their global marketing plans.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹投資決策管理之理論與實務，內容涵蓋投資專案管理、企業投資價值評量與金融投資管理等主題，目的在培養同學有關實體專案投資與金融投資之理論與評價技術。
description.en: I. IntroductionII. Portfolio Theory and PracticeIII. Equilibrium in Capital MarketsIV. Fixed-Income Securities

description.zh: 利用個案教學法使學生得以沈浸於實際問題的情境中，以集思廣益的討論方式，結合企業管理實務並融入財務相關理論，以不同構面去完整思考公司營運規畫，提昇同學未來處理相關問題的能力。
description.en: Using case teaching method, the students are able to get into the phenomenon of the corporation in discussion, and they can make use of their knowledge on management and finance to propose a future operating plan for the company. Through class discussions and group interactions, this course intends to help students build up their problem-solving ability.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對電子化企業經營與管理作探討, 其中包含: 1.電子化企業概論2.經營模式3.企業再造4.企業資源管理5.中小企業電子化6.	商業電子化7.供應鏈管理8.需求鏈管理9.協同預測管理10.個案研究
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the e-business management. The contents of this course will include: 1.	General concept of e-business management2.The business model3.	Business reengineering4.Enterprise resource planning5.Small enterprise e-business management6.	Channel e-business7.Supply chain management8.Demand chain management9.Collaborative management10.	Case Study

description.zh: 本科目將由認識地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之太陽能源有效利用裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。
description.en: The aim of this course is to discuss three individual topics of more specialized nature: large PV systems, photo-voltaic under concentrated sunlight and the hydrogen economy. After completing this course the students should be able to: 1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems, an examine their economic and technical characteristics. 2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator PV systems, and discuss their operation. 3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show its feasibility and future potential.

name.zh: 科技產業趨勢分析專案研究
name.en: Project Research of Industry Trend Analysis in High Technolo

description.zh: 1.運用Crystal Cycle 景氣週期循環訊息2.採用Porter五力分析、SWOT分析、與鑽石分析之研究工具探究相關產業的內容與現況3.	相關產業趨勢專案製作4.相關產業趨勢專案之實驗與評鑑
description.en: 1. It applies the circulate message of prosperity cycle on Crystal Cycle. 2. It explores contents and situations about relating property by Porter's five force analysis, SWOT analysis, and Diamond analysis.3. It manufactures the Project in relating property.4. It practices and criticizes the Project in relating property.

name.en: Special Topics on T-S Fuzzy Model

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹T-S fuzzy model的理論及其原理，首先介紹如何將一非線性系統藉由Fuzzy Modeling的方法，將其轉換成T-S Fuzzy Model，再以一有系統的方法設計控制器，並將穩定條件以LMI形式表示，最後利用所推導出的演算法，針對真實物理系統進行驗證。
description.en: In this course, the theory and principle of T-S fuzzy model are introduced. First, a procedure how to transform a nonlinear system to a T-S fuzzy model is introduced. Secondly, some systematic methods are introduced to design the controllers for the stability of the overall system and the stability condition is formulated by LMIs form. Finally, the design procedure is utilized to demonstrate by a real physical system.

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。決策模式、決策的環境分析、決策目標訂定、決策標準、決策樹分析、決策者心理分析，常用之統計分析理論與實證之訓練。
description.en: Decision Model, Environmental Analysis of Decision, Decision Objectives Setting, Decision Criteria, Decision Tree Analysis, Psychological Analysis of Decision Maker, Theories and Practical Training of Statistic Analysis.

description.zh: 國內外認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案，著重於創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成, 以科技整合, 人因互動,研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course provides study of ergonomics und interaction design related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the project will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，各購物網站面?品牌及差?化的競爭，網站的會員忠誠?及經營規模是決戰關鍵，成功的購物網站必須能提供優質的商品與完善的售後服務，才是維繫會員持續成長與培養客戶忠誠?的關鍵因素， PayEasy 以回饋的心情，導入?多特色商品及創造?多與會員互動的機會，以經營網站的品牌特色。說服消費者建立對網路商店的信任，是PayEasy獲得顧客的關鍵因素。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Each online store is facing competition in branding and diversity. The increasing competitiveness makes member loyalty and management scale a key issue. A successful online store must provide high quality products and complete customer service to maintain certain membership growth and cultivate member loyalty. To contribute to members, PayEasy introduces more distinguished products and increases customer interaction which is the company famous for. Establishing consumer faith in the enterprise is the critical factor to the existing members of PayEasy.

notes: 與四管三、最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養研究生具備參與國際性學術性會議或進行學術英文發表之能力，授課內容包括學習基本簡報技巧、加強簡報時所需要的英文語彙、搭配視聽器材進行實際演練活動等。
description.en: This course aims at increasing graduate-level skill of academic English presentation. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have learned the skills for general presentation and the key content vocabulary.  The simulation and practicum are also included.

name.en: Special Topics on Internal Combustion Engines

description.zh: 進、排氣系統與空氣動力學，排放物與燃燒現象，循環模擬與分析，引擎性能調諧及控制，引擎噪音源與控制。
description.en: Gas Dynamics in Intake and Exhaust Manifold, Emissions and Related Combustion Phenomena, Cycle-Simulation and Analysis, Engine Performance Tuning and Control, Engine Noise Source and Its Control.

description.zh: 本課程主要研討科技管理，內容包括：（1）導論（2）技術資源與能力（3）技術創新（4）技術策略（5）科技規劃（6）績效評估（7）科技發展倫理（8）智慧財產權。
description.en: The course mainly discusses following topics：（1）introduction, （2）technological resource and capability, （3）technological innovation,（4）strategy of technology（5）technology planning, （6）measuring performance, （7）technology development ethics, （8）intellectual property rights.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

name.zh: 迴歸分析理論探討與應用
name.en: The Theoretical Study on Regression Analysis and Its Applica

description.zh: 本課程引導學生深入研究"簡單線性迴歸"與"複迴歸"的理論基礎、技巧與用法、以及在企業管理上的應用。課程內容包含：（1）簡單線性迴歸；（2）迴歸模式適合性的推論；（3）利用迴歸模式的預測；（4）線性迴歸的應用；（5）迴歸模式假設條件的檢定；（6）複迴歸模式；（7）質量性獨立變數的處置；（8）共線性的探測；與（9）逐步迴歸分析法。課程中亦將對值得研究的議題及方向加以說明。
description.en: This course takes the students into the in-depth study on the "simple linear regression" and the "multiple regression" in terms of their theoretical background, techniques, and the applications in business. Topics covered by this course are: (1) Simple linear regression, (2) Inference based on fitted regression model, (3) prediction based on fitted regression model, (4) Application of simple linear regression, (5) Verification of regression assumption, (6) Multiple regression, (7) Qualitative independent variables, (8) Multicollinearity, and (9) Stepwise regression. Topics and directions warrant future researches will also be discussed in this course.

notes: 碩博合開，以博士生為主

description.zh: 以營利模式方法對企業，產業進行分析。研究宏觀經濟與企業生存的關係，以個案或個別產業為例深入研究。將研究結果應用於企業管理與投資。
description.en: Application of profit model's analytical tool to analyze an enterprise in depth. The same method is also applied to analyze an industrial sector. The objectives are to help a business in business decision making in order to improve its profitability.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 本課程以理論及個案為出發點，分析知識管理的基本概念知識管理在實務上的應用，知識管理在策略上的重要性，以及企業如何進行知識管理。課程主題包括，組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論，知識管理概論，知識創造與轉移，知識管理個案，知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will use case study to analysis how knowledge management impacts on the competitive advantage and its method of implementation. It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, knowledge creation, knowledge transferring, knowledge diffusuoion, and information technology impact on knowledge management.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現代化企業和組織整合，主要目標是管理面與科技面的創造，以及現代資訊科技管理與企業整合。企業為了追求更高效率與更高效能的價值鏈而快速地轉變成虛擬企業。以階層命令為主的管理模式與控制結構，不論是企業內部還是企業外部，皆已改變。在企業流程內的資訊系統也開始重新規劃，企業對企業 (B2B) 電子商務，或是稱為電子化企業，也已經變成企業生存最主要的要素。這門課將會教導上述內容，並把焦點放在所有這些相關議題，從策略規劃到現代化科技應用整合 (EAI) 等複雜的電子商務流程管理。這門課著重在報告以及創造力的訓練。在課程中，學生將會被分成若干專案小組以完成一個專案或是一份與電子化企業整合技術或工具相關的報告或應用，還有一些個案研讀。
description.en: This course introduces the modern integrated enterprises and organization. The focus is on the managerial and technical aspects of creating and managing modern IT enabled and integrated enterprises. It is clear that enterprises have been in rapid transition toward virtual enterprises with value chain integration for high efficiency and efficacy. Management styles based on hierarchical command and control structures have been challenged both within an enterprise and among enterprises.  Information systems are being realigned around business processes, and business-to-business (B2B) electronic commerce (or some call it "e-business") has become a key competence that business cannot survive without. This course provides such understanding by focusing on all aspects of managing this complex e-business oprocesses, from strategic planning to the technologies of modern enterprise application integration (EAI). The course stresses the importance of hands-on and creative training. Students will

description.en: This course will focus on following subject: 1.Global logistics environment; 2.Global logistics business model and performance evaluation; 3.Global logistics operation model; 4. 4PL in global logistics environment; 5.Other issues related global logistics, like logistic flow and customer; 6. Case study; 7. The future trend of global logistics management.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用科學與系統化的方式解決管理上的問題。整個過程包括：資料蒐集與問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、系統規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
description.en: The purpose of this course is talking about how to utilize scientific and systematical approaches to solve management problems. The solution process includes data collection and problem investigation, model formulation, optimal solution derivation, cost and efficiency analysis, system implementation and execution etc. This course mainly contains various application cases. Accordingly, participant can understand how to apply theoretical methods on solving real problems. Computational software is also utilized to solve the formulated models and analyze and interpret the obtained solutions.

description.zh: N
description.en: The purpose of this course is try to help students prepare to operate in and contribute to the 21st century. Regardless of whether a person intends to work in a business, for the government, or in a nonprofit organization, the concepts, strategies, and techniques of effective marketing are relevant. This course is:Providing from fundamental concepts through the major tasks associated with marketing to the strategic role of marketing in an organization.Bringing early attention to the global nature of marketing.Emphasizing the similarities as well as the differences between consumer and business marketing.Combining demand forecasting with its logical antecedents-segmentation, targeting, and position.Covering marketing research, after students have been exposed to consumer and business markets and segmentation.Integrating planning, implementation, and evaluation to provide a broad strategic context after students have a grasp of what marketing entails.

description.zh: 本課程探討資訊系統在現代組織中所扮演的角色，課程重點將放在企業電子化和電子商務，同學在修課過後將具備相關知識。課堂中的資訊實務技術演練，將有助於同學有效率地解決相關問題。
description.en: This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生管理一項專案時，有關時間及成本的估計、進度表與預算的編列、以及其他監督控制一項專案進行之相關技巧與應用。專案計劃書的發展、專案投資的可行性分析、專案的風險評估、專案的介面管理，以及專案團隊與專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the estimations of time and cost when managing a project, the development of project schedule and budget, and other relevant skills in monitoring and controlling the project. The development of project proposal, feasibility study of project investment, project risk assessment, project interface management, and the role of project manager in a project team within an organization will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於 生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: Planning and control of operations in both manufacturing and service industries is critical to effective management and utilization of resources and the production of cost effective products and services. The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control. In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided. This course covers the principles, models, and techniques for planning, analyzing, and designing integrated planning and control system. Course topics include the following subjects: production and operations strategy, forecasting, aggregate planning and resources requirement planning, inventory planning, production scheduling, just-in-time production system, and project management.

description.zh: 1.簡介：概觀、資訊源、通道、通訊品質、數位通訊系統 2.信號與系統：傅立葉轉換、線性系統 3.類比數位變換：取樣、量化、脈碼調變 4.機率與隨機程序 5.基頻脈波傳送：相配濾波器、信號間干擾與脈波塑型、等化 6.數位通頻傳輸：ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MSK 7.多工與展頻技術：分頻多工、分時多工、直序列與跳頻分碼多工 8.源編碼：熵、資料緊縮、霍夫曼編碼、資料壓縮、JPEG 9.通道編碼：線性區塊碼、迴旋碼
description.en: 1.introduction :overview,information sources,channels,quality measurement,a closer look of modern digital communication systems 2.Signals and Systems:Fourier transform,linear systems 3.A/D Conversion :sampling ,quantization ,PCM 4.Probability and Random Process 5.Baseband Pulse Transmission :matched filters,ISI and shaping ,qeualization 6.Digital Passband Transmisson:ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MAK 7.Multiplexing and Spread Sprctrum Techniques:FDMA,TDMA,direct sequence and frequency hopping CDMA 8.Source Coding:entropy ,data compaction,Huffman coding,data compression,JPEG 9.Channel Coding :linear block codes,convolutional codes.

description.zh: 本門授課之目的在介紹深入的有機化合物之合成方法、原理及應用，並探討有機實驗室常用之有機反應及其反應機構。
description.en: The course introduces various kinds of advanced organic synthetic methods, principles and applications. The most commonly used organic reactions and their mechanisms are also discussed.

name.en: Electrical Magnetic and Optical Properties of Materials

description.zh: 介紹材料的電性質、介電性質、磁性質及光學性質，包括 1.晶格與晶體結構 2.晶格振動 3.材料的能帶結構 4.常溫與低溫的霍爾效應 5.材料的光電效應 6.光、電、磁場對材料的影響
description.en: This course is a special topics of Optical，Electrical and Magnetic Properties of Materials, including: 1.Lattice and crystal structure;  2. Lattice vibration; 3.Band structure; 4. Hall effect-At room and low temperatures; 5. Optoelectronic effects of materials; 6. Effects of optical, electric, and magnetic fields on materials

description.zh: 本課程介紹半導體製程整合之相關技術。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to give students background in the semiconductor process integration.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程介紹如何將電化學技術應用於生物燃料電池上。生物燃料電池的觸媒主要是由酵素或是微生物甚至是生物細胞所組成，反應過程區分為電子直接轉移(mediatorless)與間接轉移(mediator)，並介紹此各種生物燃料電池的原理及應用，個別討論電池之反應過程、電池電極材料、電化學修飾電極及各種不同電池電解質溶液等個別元件。
description.en: The aim and purpose of this course is to introduce and expand the electrochemistry to develop the biofuel cells. Generally the catalysts of biofuel cell are composed by enzymes, microbial, creature cells and the bio-reduction process. In the biofuel cells the reaction process can be distinguished into mediator less and mediator transfer process. In this course, we will introduce the principle, reaction process and the application of biofuel cells. Especially, a detailed study about the utilization of film modified electrodes and different electrolyte solutions for the development of biofuel cells.

notes: 圖書館B1視聽室,碩博合開

description.zh: 現代都市規劃與建築設計除了永續環境生態之議題外，影響人體最鉅者莫過於健康環境議題，尤其在 SBS、SARS、VI、Urban Terrorism等事件之後。本課程之目的即在於傳述建築物對抗污染、病原等的能力，並探討其作業技術內容，以培養學生健康建築之檢測、規劃、設計施工及健康建築設備產品設計能力。本課程由基本永續都市中，各項相關污染、病原健康議題、技術原理及其指標講授，專業書籍導讀；進而指導實證操作技術實驗並撰寫報告，再而探討其空間規劃與產品設計實務應用。
description.en: In the practice of modern urban-planning and building-design, the most important issue would be the healthy environmental problem besides the sustainability. After the incidents of Sick Building Syndromes, SARS, Avian Flu, Urban Terrorism etc., the capability of the buildings to resist these pollution and /or pathogeny would be studied in this seminar. Various issues of the immune buildings would be discussed and thesis composition, building design model and even patent products should be achieved at the end of the semester.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源再生與管理之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，此包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再生利用技術與管理 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系
description.en: "Resource Regeneration and Managemet" is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consist of approaches and technology for waste minimization, regeneration, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and waste minimazation and management.

description.zh: 本課程利用要徑法教導學生管理一項專案有關時間及成本的估計，進度表，預算編列等技巧，及其它監督控制一項專案進行之措施。專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。課程內容包含：（1）專案的定義和辨認，（2）專案可行性研究和選擇條件，（3）專案進度表編排，（4）專案之預算與成本控制，（5）限制性資源之編排與調配，（6）專案評核與檢討技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the technique of Critical Path Method (CPM) to manage a project in terms of time / cost estimation, scheduling, budgeting, and other control / monitoring measures on the performance of a project. The role of project manager in an organization will also be discussed. Topics to be covered are: (1) Concept and identification of a project, (2) Project feasibility study and selection criteria, (3) Project scheduling, (4) Budgeting and cost control, (5) Constrained resource scheduling and leveling, and (6) Project evaluation and review technique.

description.zh: 類比系統、數位系統設計、數位控制及微處理機、介面程式設計、程式語言及軟體等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Analogy systems, Digital systems designed, Digital control and microprocessors, Interface programming design, Computer programming, software and Lab.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 教導學員如何利用心智圖，把思維作放射狀延伸、教導學員如何利用國內專利資料庫、教導TRIZ理論，並作出有效之專利迴避設計、工程範例應用
description.en: Teaching the students mind mapping techniques in order to form a radiant creative thinking, Teaching the students the searching techniques of the patent database, Introduce the TRIZ theory and the design around techniques, Practical engineering applications

description.zh: 水文遙測主要之目的為藉由衛星及飛機等的儀器收集地表對不同波長之反射特性，並加以分析，因此可用於國土監測及防災等。藉由波長反射的特性可率訂所需的參數，將可用於大尺度的模擬，如地表能量平衡、地表水文、土地利用、植物指標、地表溫度、輻射通量及地表土壤濕度等。
description.en: Observations by instruments on board satellites provide data on radiative characteristics of the earth's surface at various wavelengths.  From these characteristics, one may determine parameters of interest for large-scale modeling of the earth's energy balance and surface hydrology, for instance land use, vegetation indices, surface temperature, radiative fluxes, and surface soil moisture.

name.zh: 創新講座--文化生活創意

description.zh: 本課程係提供本校學生與創意界交流的平台，提供學生建立人文藝術相關之涵養，並協助學生體驗文化生活創意之實務過程，透過邀請國內著名之文化生活創意相關之產、官、學界專家進行專題講座，經由專家之經驗分享與傳承，以激發學生透過自身生活之經驗學習創意發展之可能性，開發其創意之潛能。
description.en: Course Description：    This course provide a platform to generate between student and creativity. It could students to build the temperament of human arts, and experience practical process of cultural life creativity. Through the invitation of the cultural life creative expert in production, official, education to have a speech. By the way of sharing and passing down, it could stimulate the learning creative develop possibility of students in their daily life, and develop the potential of creativity.

notes: 四設四與創新所合開,上課時間為四(ABC)共6週

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 設計專業用進階德文；設計專業德文導讀及加強德文的聽、說、讀、寫能力，概念理解及溝通設計用之德文。
description.en: The alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of advanced German to building the capability of reading, speaking, writing and understanding the design advanced German.
